docs.text:
A5 Booklets


Working with 
pgfmorepages
 and 
HERE
 to produce an A5 booklet with notes on Etching technique. There is an arch here, from attending a British Library Book Binding course, a long running interest in Latex/Tikz, and attendance at the Putney School of Art 
 Design learning Etching. Sadly lockdown interrupted the classes.


23 July 2020
